paper.title: ESM Systems and the Composition of Their Computations
paper.venue: Proceedings of the International Workshop on Graph Transformations in Computer Science
paper.abstract: ESM systems are graph rewriting systems where productions are morphisms in a suitable category, ESM. The way graphs are transformed in ESM systems is essentially the same as in actor grammars, which were introduced in [JR].
